name: marinated fish
ingredients: Chermoula Marinade: Juice of one lemon or bergamot, 1/2 glass of olive oil, 3 to 4 garlic cloves, 1 large bunch of parsley, 1 large bunch of coriander, 1/2 teaspoon of paprika, 1/4 teaspoon of pepper, 1 teaspoon of cumin, 1 teaspoon of turmeric, salt, chili (optional)
steps: Finely chop the bunches of coriander and parsley, as well as the garlic cloves. Crush everything in a mortar (or blend).
Add all the spices (salt, pepper, cumin, turmeric, paprika, chili) and mix well.
Add the lemon juice and olive oil, mix again.
Marinate the fish (whole, in pieces, or fillets) with this chermoula for at least 30 minutes in the fridge (one hour is ideal).
Cook the fish in the oven, in a pan, or on a grill. Serve hot.
